name: Trepanation
description: Through careful study and practice, you have learned how to relieve pressure in the brain to balance the humors, promote health, and ward off outside influence.
benefit: You can perform the faith healing occult skill unlock<sup>OA</sup> even if you canâ€™t use psychic magic. If you can cast psychic spells or have the Psychic Sensitivity<sup>OA</sup> feat, you can use faith healing one additional time per day.
